item.title: By: I’ve Got White in My Ledger–and I’d Like to Wipe it Out – Luna Station Quarterly
item.dc:creator: I’ve Got White in My Ledger–and I’d Like to Wipe it Out – Luna Station Quarterly
item.description: […] JUST WRITING WHAT YOU KNOW! Like a Kraken summoned from the deep, HetPat crawls his way out of my mind swamp to share his unsolicited two-cents. WE ALREADY AGREED THAT […]

item.title: By: Male as Default—Getting Better at Writing Women When You ARE a Women – Luna Station Quarterly
item.dc:creator: Male as Default—Getting Better at Writing Women When You ARE a Women – Luna Station Quarterly
item.description: […] HetPat–the anxiety demon and resident paragon of the patriarchy, who lives in my head and likes to shout at me–has some ideas. […]
